name: ToledoVR
description: ToledoVR is a action/strategy game for the HTC Vive. Play as a god from the top and fight as a hero on the ground. Playable both in VR and on the PC simultaneously (local multiplayer).
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 750 ti / AMD 5850 Storage: 5 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 10 Processor: Intel Core i7 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: AMD RX 480 / GTX 1060 Storage: 10 GB available space
